title: Design News
description: Stay updated with the latest design news and trends. Daily updates on design tools, industry news, new products, and design community highlights from Product Hunt, Designer News, and leading design teams at Airbnb, Google, and Microsoft.

resources.title: AirBnb Design
resources.description: Design influences everything we do at Airbnb.

resources.title: All Design Conferences
resources.description: This site is just a simple collection of all design and front-end conferences for the year.

resources.title: Beta List
resources.description: Directory of upcoming startups and new internet products. Get early access to beta launches and discover innovative tools before they go mainstream.

resources.title: Beta Page
resources.description: Daily newsletter featuring new startups and product launches. Stay informed about the latest tools, apps, and services launching each day.

resources.title: Design Calendar
resources.description: An online community made for creatives who believe in the power of ideas and the joy of making them happen.

resources.title: Designer News
resources.description: Designer News is a large, global community of people working in design and technology or those interested in the topics.

resources.title: Dropbox Design
resources.description: Insights, stories, and resources from Dropbox's design team. Learn about their design process, research, and product thinking.

resources.title: Facebook Design
resources.description: Designing for the global diversity of human needs.

resources.title: Google Design
resources.description: Supporting the future of design and technology.

resources.title: Hey Designer
resources.description: Daily curated design knowledge.

resources.title: Microsoft Design
resources.description: Whether you want to practice new skills, develop new concepts, or create prototypes, these toolkits are your place to start.

resources.title: Product Hunt
resources.description: Product Hunt surfaces the best new products, every day.

resources.title: Shaping Design
resources.description: Operating at the intersection of design and technology, we cover a wide range of creative fields, predominantly web design and UX.

resources.title: Sidebar
resources.description: Sidebar has been collecting the best design links of the day since October 2012.

resources.title: Slant
resources.description: Trustworthy product rankings for all your shopping needs.

resources.title: Steemhunt
resources.description: Community-driven product discovery platform where you can hunt and upvote cool new products. Earn cryptocurrency rewards for contributing quality finds.

resources.title: The UX Collective
resources.description: Curated stories on UX, Visual & Product Design.

resources.title: UsTwo
resources.description: Insights and stories from the award-winning digital product studio behind Monument Valley. Articles on design, technology, and creating impactful products.

resources.title: UX Movement
resources.description: When an app, website, or interface is difficult to use, it’s not the user’s fault, but the designer’s for making it unusable.

resources.title: Web Designer News
resources.description: We built WebdesignerNews.com to provide web designers and developers with a single location to discover the latest and most significant stories on the Web.
